{{ddcl | since=reflection_ts | header=experimental/reflect | 1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
concept Namespace = Scope&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; /* see below */;
}}

The {{tt|Namespace}} concept is satisfied if and only if T reflects a namespace including the global namespace (Note: Any such T that does not reflect the global namespace also satisfies {{tt|ScopeMember}}).
